marginalia.anchor_text: so nemen sie von der Sonnen jre krafft

position.marginalia_text: Stella[e] Ex sole recipiu[n]t suaru[m] viriu[m] actiuitate[m].

marginalia.translation: From the sun retake their activity of their strengths.

marginalia.anchor_text: Der Winter Sternen ist der Mon der Obriste

position.marginalia_text: Luna est prima et principalis stella Hyemalis

marginalia.translation: The moon is the first and principal winter star.
